Summary: A basic tutorial using an Apple-produced Java tutorial to learn about how to build .NET applications for Cocoa#

When learning how to develop for Cocoa using Mono, I found this tutorial for developing Cocoa apps in Java very handy.
The tutorial can be found here: [http://developer.apple.com/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/JavaTutorial/index.html]
